LABEL: 0x46F
STRING: I'm tired after everything that's happened today.

LABEL: 0x4B6
STRING: I crawled under the covers and closed my eyes.

LABEL: 0x503
STRING: ...What the heck.

LABEL: 0x540
STRING: Anyway, I'm glad Sycoe is unhurt. ...I'm glad she's alive.

LABEL: 0x5AD
STRING: I might not be able to do anything specific to help...

LABEL: 0x62C
STRING: But, just being alive should be a happy thing. It's not a misfortune to be alive.

LABEL: 0x691
STRING: As long as you keep on living, you can be happy someday, right?

LABEL: 0x6FE
STRING: If you don't give up, for sure...

LABEL: 0x759
STRING: Just as my consciousness was drifting off to sleep, I suddenly heard what sounded like a tap on the window.

LABEL: 0x7C2
STRING: Maybe the wind blew a pebble against the window.

LABEL: 0x82B
STRING: Whatever, let's just get some rest for today...

LABEL: 0x88E
STRING: ...What, it isn't a thief, is it?

LABEL: 0x8D9
STRING: Sure enough, I heard it. The sound of tapping on the window.

LABEL: 0x92C
STRING: I anxiously walked over to the window and opened the curtains.

LABEL: 0x98D
STRING: Sycoe...

LABEL: 0x9C2
STRING: She smiled when our eyes met.

LABEL: 0xA6B
STRING: I hurriedly put on my jacket and sandals and went outside. Sycoe, who was waiting in front of the house, smiled apologetically.

LABEL: 0xBC3
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xBD1
STRING: "I'm sorry, coming at this hour... Were you asleep? I hope I didn't wake you, it would be a shock."

LABEL: 0xD7E
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xD8C
STRING: "...Eheh. I just wanted to take a moment to say... my last farewells."

LABEL: 0xE96
STRING: I have a bad feeling about her words which were packed with meaning.

LABEL: 0xFD8
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xFE6
STRING: "Yeah. ...I'm going to leave this town."

LABEL: 0x117B
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x1189
STRING: "So... I won't be able to see you anymore, Metarou-kun..."

LABEL: 0x1274
STRING: She utters a statement that I don't want to believe.

LABEL: 0x12D3
STRING: There's no way you can convince me of something like that all of a sudden...!

LABEL: 0x13DE
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x13EC
STRING: "I'm going to the place of some uncle I don't know... in an unknown city, working at some unknown store. There, they'll take care of me..."

LABEL: 0x1505
STRING: "Uncle I don't know", "unknown city"、"unknown store"...

LABEL: 0x156C
STRING: My feeling of unease is getting stronger and stronger.

LABEL: 0x15C3
STRING: What's up with that uncle? Who is he? An unknown city? Unknown store? Exactly what is going on!!!?

LABEL: 0x1652
STRING: I don't even have the right to know that!!?

LABEL: 0x1749
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x1757
STRING: "...Thank you for everything up to now, Metarou-kun."

LABEL: 0x183C
STRING: Ignoring my questioning gaze, Sycoe continued.

LABEL: 0x193B
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x1949
STRING: "I had so much, so much... fun together with you, Metarou-kun."

LABEL: 0x1A46
STRING: She was talking desperately in a shaky voice, fighting back tears.

LABEL: 0x1AA7
STRING: Seeing the tears well up in her eyes, I felt like doing the same.

LABEL: 0x1BB0
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x1BBE
STRING: "We watered the flowerbeds together, made rainbows, and flowers bloomed... Every day was shining and bright."

LABEL: 0x1D6F
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x1D7D
STRING: "I'm glad I talked to you that day, Metarou-kun... I'm glad I met you..."

LABEL: 0x1F2C
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x1F3A
STRING: "My whole life has been nothing but misfortune..."

LABEL: 0x20C3
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x20D1
STRING: "But I got to meet Metarou-kun... That is the one thing I'm truly happy about."

LABEL: 0x226C
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x227A
STRING: "If we meet again sometime.... Let's have banana crepes together."

LABEL: 0x23F8
STRING: Please, be well...

LABEL: 0x2445
STRING: Even if you go to an unknown city far away from here.

LABEL: 0x2494
STRING: Even if you never see me again...

LABEL: 0x257D
STRING: Hearing this, Sycoe hung her head.

LABEL: 0x25CE
STRING: She remained motionless for a while, her expression completely unreadable.

LABEL: 0x26CF
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x26DD
STRING: "Met, Metarou-kun... You'll help me, won't you?"

LABEL: 0x27CC
STRING: She mumbled something and then walked up to me.

LABEL: 0x28CF
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x28DD
STRING: "Because the other day you told me... that you were worried about me and that you wanted to save me, didn't you?"

LABEL: 0x2B17
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2B25
STRING: "Here you go. Touch〜"

LABEL: 0x2B66
STRING: As she said that, she firmly touched my shoulder.

LABEL: 0x2C1D
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2C2B
STRING: "U, fufufu...! It's curse tag...!!!"

LABEL: 0x2C9A
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2CA8
STRING: "Sycoe will give her curse... to Metarou-kun!!!"

LIST.STRING: What do you mean by that...!?

LABEL: 0x2DAD
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2DBB
STRING: "What are you mad about, Metarou-kun? You said it yourself, that such games are silly and nothing but superstition!"

LABEL: 0x2E62
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2E70
STRING: "So, it's okay, right? Since it's just a game of 'curse tag!'"

LABEL: 0x2F39
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2F47
STRING: "Whew, thank goodness. Now I don't have to go through all that scary stuff anymore..."

LABEL: 0x2FC6
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2FD4
STRING: "Sorry, and thanks! Metarou-kun!"

LABEL: 0x3089
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3097
STRING: "Ahaha, Ahaha, Ahahahaha!!!"

LABEL: 0x315D
STRING: From that day on, I suffered countless misfortunes.

LABEL: 0x31BC
STRING: I lost my parents, the company I worked for was in trouble, I got fired, became homeless, and now I'm on the verge of death, struggling for food every day...

LABEL: 0x325D
STRING: How many years have passed since the day she infected me with her misfortune...?

LABEL: 0x32CA
STRING: And now I'm about to be murdered for no apparent reason by people I don't even know.

LABEL: 0x3339
STRING: I hid myself in a narrow alley, hoping that I won't be found in here.

LABEL: 0x339A
STRING: ...It sounds like a lie... it does. But... I'm definitely in a life and death situation right now. Some crazy guy is trying to kill me.

LABEL: 0x343F
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x344D
STRING: "...As I told you, misfortune is contagious. The curse was real after all..."

LABEL: 0x3523
STRING: In front of me stood a familiar-looking woman.

LABEL: 0x358A
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3598
STRING: "Hey, long time no see, Metarou-kun."

LABEL: 0x35FF
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x360D
STRING: "Remember me? I'm Sycoe, your classmate back in high school..."

LABEL: 0x3674
STRING: ...Ah, Sycoe. Did she come to save me?

LABEL: 0x36CD
STRING: To return the favour back when we were still students...

LABEL: 0x377C
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x378A
STRING: "I'm not unhappy anymore since I passed on the curse to you. I know it sounds crazy, but it's true."

LABEL: 0x3839
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3847
STRING: "Did you take all the bad stuff away for me?"

LABEL: 0x3910
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x391E
STRING: "Or maybe, you were born under a star of misfortune from the beginning? I dunno, ahahahahaha!"

LABEL: 0x3998
STRING: I reached out my worn and dirty hands to Sycoe who was giggling.

LABEL: 0x3AA9
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3AB7
STRING: "No, don't touch me. Your misery is contagious."

LABEL: 0x3B16
STRING: She said in a cold voice that I couldn't imagine coming from the Sycoe I once knew.

LABEL: 0x3B8F
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3B9D
STRING: "You didn't reach out to me when I was in trouble, did you? You just told me... to be well, right?"

LABEL: 0x3C96
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3CA4
STRING: "Now... I'm super happy and doing well! Metarou-kun, aren't you glad that your wish came true?"

LABEL: 0x3D75
STRING: Then she left with a narrow smile on her face...

LABEL: Custom3
STRING: BAD END「Curse Tag」

LABEL: 0x444F
STRING: Even so... I still want to save Sycoe!!

LABEL: 0x44A0
STRING: I hugged her petite body tightly with both hands.

LABEL: 0x45C2
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x45D0
STRING: "Me...tarou...kun...?"

LABEL: 0x461D
STRING: I want to save her...!!! I'm the only one who can do it... Just me alone!

LABEL: 0x46A4
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x46B2
STRING: "Y-you can't...! Metarou-kun, you should quickly leave me."

LABEL: 0x472F
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x473D
STRING: "If you're with me, even you will be misfortunate too...!"

LABEL: 0x47BE
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x47CC
STRING: "I'll burden you again... You might even die this time... I definitely don't want that!"

LABEL: 0x4863
STRING: ─That doesn't matter to me.

LABEL: 0x48AC
STRING: I'll risk my life and everything I have to save you...

LABEL: 0x4911
STRING: I'm not leaving you until you become happy for sure!

LABEL: 0x4A30
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x4A3E
STRING: "Uu...hic...Uwaaaaaaaaa...!!!"

LABEL: 0x4AA4
STRING: A large amount of tears spilled from her eyes and ran down her face.

LABEL: 0x4AF9
STRING: Even if we are burned together in the flames of hell... I will stay by your side.

LABEL: 0x4CD0
STRING: ─Since that day...

LABEL: 0x4D0B
STRING: A few years had passed since Sycoe and I eloped.

LABEL: 0x4D6E
STRING: We escaped from the debt collectors pursuing us, and although we weren't rich, we had a peaceful life.

LABEL: 0x4DE7
STRING: Today we decided to go a bit further than usual to visit a flower garden.

LABEL: 0x4E48
STRING: Going the place where Sycoe's favourite pink flowers bloomed.

LABEL: 0x4EA1
STRING: I took out a small case from my pocket.

LABEL: 0x4EF4
STRING: I held out the engagement ring in front of her.

LABEL: 0x4F45
STRING: ─My mind was already made up.

LABEL: 0x4F94
STRING: She burst into tears and smiled the happiest smile I had ever seen.

LABEL: 0x5009
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5017
STRING: "You know, I was once told that I could never be happy."

LABEL: 0x509C
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x50AA
STRING: "It's funny. But, it was not completely wrong."

LABEL: 0x5119
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5127
STRING: "I've chosen a life of misery."

LABEL: 0x5192
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x51A0
STRING: "I'm sure if someone really wanted to be happy... if they really wanted to get out of their misery, they could do so in a heartbeat."

LABEL: 0x5243
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5251
STRING: "But I make myself unhappy, you see."

LABEL: 0x52C8
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x52D6
STRING: "I don't want to be a bother to anyone, so... I had just wanted to die."

LABEL: 0x535B
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5369
STRING: "But people who want to die, really just want someone to help them, don't they?"

LABEL: 0x53F0
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x53FE
STRING: "I just wanted someone to find me before I die."

LABEL: 0x546F
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x547D
STRING: "Because once you die, you can't even do that. Because it's really over then."

LABEL: 0x555C
STRING: It's just the two of us on the station platform, waiting for the train home.

LABEL: 0x55CD
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x55DB
STRING: "...The train is late. Maybe because we're in the country?"

LABEL: 0x5640
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x564E
STRING: "When we get home, let's have dinner. Hey, what do you want to eat?"

LABEL: 0x56AD
STRING: I've gotten to the point where I can hold silly and trivial conversations with her.

LABEL: 0x570E
STRING: We got to know each other so well that we could even joke around.

LABEL: 0x5779
STRING: She still has the same misfortunate disposition as ever, but it's not so bad to the point of being deadly.

LABEL: 0x583C
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x584A
STRING: "Metarou-kun, if I said I want to die..."

LABEL: 0x58BB
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x58C9
STRING: "Would you die with me?"

LABEL: 0x59FE
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5A0C
STRING: "...Juuust kidding! It's a lie. Were you surprised?"

LABEL: 0x5A7B
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5A89
STRING: "I won't say stupid things like that anymore."

LABEL: 0x5AFA
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5B08
STRING: "Because you're here with me now, Metarou-kun!"

LABEL: 0x5B7B
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5B89
STRING: "Right now... I'm so, so happy!"

LABEL: 0x5D07
STRING: Dad

LABEL: 0x5D19
STRING: "I told you already, we don't have any money for health care!"

LABEL: 0x5D8A
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x5D9C
STRING: "Hey, cut it out! Look where you are! Everyone's looking at you!!"

LABEL: 0x5E1D
STRING: Dad

LABEL: 0x5E2F
STRING: "Then I don't want that daughter of mine! Hell if I care if she dies! I can't afford her!"

LABEL: 0x5EB2
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x5EC4
STRING: "What the hell are you saying?!! That's our child you're talking about! Our treasure!"

LABEL: 0x5F47
STRING: Dad

LABEL: 0x5F59
STRING: "I don't care! I don't remember having a child like that!!"

LABEL: 0x5FC2
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x5FD4
STRING: "Enough damn it! Stop talking about money, why don't you stop gambling it all away instead!"

LABEL: 0x6063
STRING: Dad

LABEL: 0x6075
STRING: "Shut up! The other day, you bought a strange jar that cost a million yen too!"

LABEL: 0x60F7
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x6109
STRING: "That's a holy relic that can attract and save up money! Nothing like your wasteful spending!"

LABEL: 0x61D3
STRING: Mom and Dad were having a dispute about my medical expenses.

LABEL: 0x622C
STRING: The sounds came from outside my hospital room. Even though they were in a hallway, their voices echoed all the way to here.

LABEL: 0x629D
STRING: All this happened... just because I got hit by a car and broke my arm.

LABEL: 0x6324
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x6332
STRING: "Please stop it... please stop, Mom, Dad..."

LABEL: 0x6393
STRING: Seeing me in tears, the nurses all expressed their pity.

LABEL: 0x6414
STRING: Nurse

LABEL: 0x6424
STRING: "Sycoe-chan, I'm so sorry for you... with parents like that."

LABEL: 0x6493
STRING: Nurse

LABEL: 0x64A3
STRING: "Yeah... a child doesn't get to choose their parents, do they?"

LABEL: 0x65DE
STRING: It felt good to have people look at me with pity.

LABEL: 0x663D
STRING: I know it's weird, but... I'm strange like that.

LABEL: 0x669C
STRING: I know I shouldn't be having these inappropriate thoughts, but...

LABEL: 0x66FB
STRING: It's such an irresistible pleasure... to be looked at with pity.

LABEL: 0x675E
STRING: Here I am, poor little me, come look at me, people, and be kind to me. I want to be pampered.

LABEL: 0x67E5
STRING: Yes. I'm in love with my pitiful self...

LABEL: 0x6844
STRING: That's why I play this role, no matter how much I'm laughing in my heart.

LABEL: 0x68AB
STRING: I'm trying so hard to hold in my laughter and play the poor, little, needy Sycoe...!

LABEL: 0x69EC
STRING: ...One evening, when everyone was fast asleep.

LABEL: 0x6A3B
STRING: I made sure that Mom and Dad were asleep in their bedroom.

LABEL: 0x6AA2
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x6AB0
STRING: "You two... are not needed anymore."

LABEL: 0x6B08
STRING: So I set the tattered carpet of my house on fire, and left...

LABEL: 0x6EA1
STRING: HAPPY END「True Happiness」

LABEL: 0x6ED3
STRING: Clear Password Part 5:「flo」
